name: hand shadow game
description:
it's recommended to play the downloadable build instead, as it has a built-in ui-hiding screenshot button and allows you to toggle the fullscreen mode by pressing [F]!

this does not work on mobile sadly 😔 (unless your phone has a mouse and keyboard, in that case go ahead)

Controls

  • Left Mouse Button: rotate hand parts
  • Right Mouse Button: drag hands
  • Middle Mouse Button: delete hands
